titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the right honourable the lord maior of London, and the Court of Aldermen, &c., on Easter-Monday, 1692 being one of the anniversary spittal-sermons / by Edward Lord Bishop of Gloucester.
titleStmt.author: Fowler, Edward, 1632-1714.

notesStmt.note: Half-title page reads: The Bishop of Gloucester's sermon on Easter-Monday.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
